The timing will depend on market conditions, Chrysler's financial results and its ability to refinance the government loans, Sergio Marchionne said. Because of these changed market conditions as well as the improvements in our performance and outlook, made possible through the support of the U.S. and Canadian governments, Chrysler intends to repay these loans in full at the earliest opportunity, Sergio Marchionne said in today's statement. year- revealed on the show today( 03.02.11) that she and partner DJ Darren Emerson split some time ago, but have remained close in order to protect their two-year-old son Ben. She said: As you ladies are aware I separated from Darren Emerson some time ago and we have worked through this together. We have come to terms with it now and are now able to speak about it. Every relationship where a child is involved is born out of love. There is a little boy in the middle and he has to come first. There is an overwhelming emotion of sadness but it doesn't make me want to scream and shout. It makes me want to learn from it. " I wouldn't watch the show now because it would be like seeing your ex-boyfriend with his new girlfriend. " Kate Thornton and Darren Emerson started dating in 2004 and got engaged in 2007.
